errors.error_description: The `pip install from source` command provides an invalid git URL, missing the `.git` suffix, which will cause the installation to fail.
correction_candidates: Add the `.git` suffix to the URL: `pip install -U git+https://github.com/ai4co/rl4co.git`.
Remove the `git+` prefix from the URL.
Replace the command with `pip install -U rl4co --index-url https://github.com/ai4co/rl4co`.
Add `@main` to the end of the URL to specify the branch: `pip install -U git+https://github.com/ai4co/rl4co@main`.
errors.golden_answer: Add the `.git` suffix to the URL: `pip install -U git+https://github.com/ai4co/rl4co.git`.
